title: Battlecast Bundle
body: I just bought $20 worth of RP to buy the Battlecast bundle.... And then you just took it down from the market. Please put it back on the store at the same price Riot.

replies.body: They screwed up the pricing mang. Gotta go fast.

Hi Jayko,

We're currently working on a couple of issues with the bundle - it will be back in the store soon!

Cheers
Mindstar
Ummm... It just came back into the store for like 2200 RP... whats happening?
The bundle price will change, depending on how many of the champions / skins you already own.  If it is showing as 2200, it sounds like you already have a lot of the content in the bundle.

> I just bought $20 worth of RP to buy the Battlecast bundle.... And then you just took it down from the market. Please put it back on the store at the same price Riot.

That was an error price. Should be around 8k RP if you have all the champions.
